action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a street with a green bike lane in the foreground. There are buildings on both sides of the street. There is a traffic light with a yellow light on the right side of the image. There is a sign that says "Georgia St" on the left side of the image. There is a tree on the left side of the image. There is a cyclist in the bike lane. There are cars parked on the side of the street. There is a sign that says "Parking" on the right side of the image.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a messy room with a computer desk in the center. There is a computer monitor on the desk, a keyboard, and a mouse. There is also a chair in the background. The room is cluttered with boxes, bags, and other items. There is a window in the background, and a pink curtain is drawn across it. There is also a TV on top of a shelf.

QUESTION: Is there a computer monitor in your image?
